trans-unit.source: Invoice by Sales Order

seg-source.mrk: Invoice by Sales Order

trans-unit.source: When invoicing by sales order, invoices can be created using the Performance per Period or Cumulative Invoicing models. This section addresses the Performance per Period model.

seg-source.mrk: When invoicing by sales order, invoices can be created using the Performance per Period or Cumulative Invoicing models.
This section addresses the Performance per Period model.

trans-unit.source: With this model, measurements are taken over to the sales orders first by updating the Qty. to Ship with the differing quantities and then invoices are posted. At the end of the project, a final invoice is created with all measurement quantities replacing sales order quantities.

seg-source.mrk: With this model, measurements are taken over to the sales orders first by updating the Qty.
to Ship with the differing quantities and then invoices are posted.
At the end of the project, a final invoice is created with all measurement quantities replacing sales order quantities.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: In this section, Construction Charges are not added to the invoices but can be added in the Sales Orders before posting using the same process as described in section .

seg-source.mrk: In this section, Construction Charges are not added to the invoices but can be added in the Sales Orders before posting using the same process as described in section .

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites

seg-source.mrk: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: Before creating the invoice, the following settings must be done:

seg-source.mrk: Before creating the invoice, the following settings must be done:

trans-unit.source: Job Card, Invoice Model = Performance per Period

seg-source.mrk: Job Card, Invoice Model = Performance per Period

trans-unit.source: BoQ Budget Calculation = Sales Code must have Posting by = Sales Order

seg-source.mrk: BoQ Budget Calculation = Sales Code must have Posting by = Sales Order

trans-unit.source: Sales Order, Invoice Base = Measurement

seg-source.mrk: Sales Order, Invoice Base = Measurement

trans-unit.source: Registered Measurement has been created and confirmed

seg-source.mrk: Registered Measurement has been created and confirmed

trans-unit.source: Report Selections Sales = Invoice set to report 5292686

seg-source.mrk: Report Selections Sales = Invoice set to report 5292686

trans-unit.source: Post Sales Orders with Measurements

seg-source.mrk: Post Sales Orders with Measurements

trans-unit.source: When it is time to post an order with measurements, open the Job Card and click the value in the Orders field of the Project Information FactBox.

seg-source.mrk: When it is time to post an order with measurements, open the Job Card and click the value in the Orders field of the Project Information FactBox.

trans-unit.source: : Opening the Sales Order from the Job Card

seg-source.mrk: : Opening the Sales Order from the Job Card

trans-unit.source: In the Sales Orders list page, click Edit. The Sales Order opens with Job positions, registered measurement values (as confirmed in section “Registered Measurement Documents” on page 1) and proper invoice settings in the Construction Invoicing FastTab.

seg-source.mrk: In the Sales Orders list page, click Edit.

The Sales Order opens with Job positions, registered measurement values (as confirmed in section “Registered Measurement Documents” on page 1) and proper invoice settings in the Construction Invoicing FastTab.

trans-unit.source: : Sales Order with positions and registered measurements

seg-source.mrk: : Sales Order with positions and registered measurements

trans-unit.source: In the Construction Invoicing FastTab, fill in the Period of performance from and Period of performance to fields with the range of the measurement invoicing.

seg-source.mrk: In the Construction Invoicing FastTab, fill in the Period of performance from and Period of performance to fields with the range of the measurement invoicing.

trans-unit.source: : Invoicing range entered in Construction Invoicing FastTab

seg-source.mrk: : Invoicing range entered in Construction Invoicing FastTab

trans-unit.source: Take Over Measurements

seg-source.mrk: Take Over Measurements

trans-unit.source: The “Take over Measurements” function compares the measurement quantities with the order quantities. There are two options for taking over the measurements:

seg-source.mrk: The “Take over Measurements” function compares the measurement quantities with the order quantities.
There are two options for taking over the measurements:

trans-unit.source: Keep order quantities – Measurement quantities are transferred to the Qty. to Ship field and the order quantity remains unchanged, unless the measurement quantity exceeds the order quantity. In that case, the order quantity is updated to match the measurement quantity. This option is used during the iteration posting so that the measurement quantities are posted.

seg-source.mrk: Keep order quantities – Measurement quantities are transferred to the <span class="Bold">Qty.
to Ship field and the order quantity remains unchanged, unless the measurement quantity exceeds the order quantity.
In that case, the order quantity is updated to match the measurement quantity.
This option is used during the iteration posting so that the measurement quantities are posted.

trans-unit.source: Update order quantities – Order quantities are updated to the measurement quantities. This option is used for the final invoice posting.

seg-source.mrk: Update order quantities – Order quantities are updated to the measurement quantities.
This option is used for the final invoice posting.

trans-unit.source: In the Sales Order, click Actions > Take over Measurements. A message appears asking to update the order quantity from the measurement quantity.

seg-source.mrk: In the Sales Order, click Actions > Take over Measurements.
A message appears asking to update the order quantity from the measurement quantity.

trans-unit.source: : Running the Take over Measurements function

seg-source.mrk: : Running the Take over Measurements function

trans-unit.source: Click Yes to continue the process or No to cancel the process. A message appears asking to keep or update the order quantity.

seg-source.mrk: Click Yes to continue the process or No to cancel the process.
A message appears asking to keep or update the order quantity.

trans-unit.source: : Keep or update order quantity message

seg-source.mrk: : Keep or update order quantity message

trans-unit.source: With the Keep order quantity option selected, click OK. The Qty. to Ship field is cleared on all lines except those with measurement values, and contains the Measurement Quantity, not the order quantity.

seg-source.mrk: With the Keep order quantity option selected, click OK.
The <span class="Bold">Qty.
to Ship field is cleared on all lines except those with measurement values, and contains the Measurement Quantity, not the order quantity.

trans-unit.source: : Qty. to Ship updated with measurement quantities; order quantities unchanged

seg-source.mrk: : Qty.
to Ship updated with measurement quantities; order quantities unchanged

trans-unit.source: Also note that the Measurement Summary Code field is now populated in the Construction Invoicing FastTab. Click Navigate > Measurement Summary to view the summary document that will be used for printing.

seg-source.mrk: Also note that the Measurement Summary Code field is now populated in the Construction Invoicing FastTab.
Click Navigate > Measurement Summary to view the summary document that will be used for printing.

trans-unit.source: : Measurement Summary assigned to Sales Order

seg-source.mrk: : Measurement Summary assigned to Sales Order

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Measurement Summary page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Measurement Summary page.

trans-unit.source: Post Sales Order and Print Document

seg-source.mrk: Post Sales Order and Print Document

trans-unit.source: Click Home > Post to ship and invoice the sales order. Notice that the Qty. to Ship field is updated with all remaining quantities and the Qty. Shipped shows the shipped values. Also notice that the Measurement Summary Code field is cleared in the Construction Invoicing FastTab since the measurement has been processed.

seg-source.mrk: Click Home > Post to ship and invoice the sales order.
Notice that the <span class="Bold">Qty.
to Ship field is updated with all remaining quantities and the Qty.
Shipped shows the shipped values.
Also notice that the Measurement Summary Code field is cleared in the Construction Invoicing FastTab since the measurement has been processed.

trans-unit.source: : Sales Order after posting

seg-source.mrk: : Sales Order after posting

trans-unit.source: Click Navigate > Invoices > View to open the Posted Sales Invoice. The Construction Invoicing FastTab displays related construction information.

seg-source.mrk: Click Navigate > Invoices > View to open the Posted Sales Invoice.
The Construction Invoicing FastTab displays related construction information.

trans-unit.source: : Posted Sales Invoice

seg-source.mrk: : Posted Sales Invoice

trans-unit.source: Click Actions > Print to open the Sales - Invoice dialog (for report 5292686). The BoQ Print Options FastTab includes special printing options. Select the Print Measurement Lines check box.

seg-source.mrk: Click Actions > Print to open the Sales - Invoice dialog (for report 5292686).
The BoQ Print Options FastTab includes special printing options.
Select the Print Measurement Lines check box.

trans-unit.source: : Sales - Invoice dialog, preparing to preview the Sales Invoice with measurement lines

seg-source.mrk: : Sales - Invoice dialog, preparing to preview the Sales Invoice with measurement lines

trans-unit.source: Click Print to generate a document or Preview to view the document. The Sales Invoice document contains measurement information.

seg-source.mrk: Click Print to generate a document or Preview to view the document.
The Sales Invoice document contains measurement information.

trans-unit.source: : Sales Invoice with Measurements

seg-source.mrk: : Sales Invoice with Measurements

trans-unit.source: Escape back to the Sales Order.

seg-source.mrk: Escape back to the Sales Order.

trans-unit.source: Add New Measurements

seg-source.mrk: Add New Measurements

trans-unit.source: As previously stated, invoices are created through the construction process for all measurements until all positions have been invoiced. This section shows how to add measurements.

seg-source.mrk: As previously stated, invoices are created through the construction process for all measurements until all positions have been invoiced.
This section shows how to add measurements.

trans-unit.source: In the Sales Order, click Home > Measurement Document. A message appears asking to insert the complete BoQ in the measurement document.

seg-source.mrk: In the Sales Order, click Home > Measurement Document.
A message appears asking to insert the complete BoQ in the measurement document.

trans-unit.source: : Creating a new Measurement Document for the sales order

seg-source.mrk: : Creating a new Measurement Document for the sales order

trans-unit.source: Click Yes to insert the complete BoQ. A new Measurement Recording Card opens.

seg-source.mrk: Click Yes to insert the complete BoQ.
A new Measurement Recording Card opens.

trans-unit.source: : New Measurement Recording Card for job

seg-source.mrk: : New Measurement Recording Card for job

trans-unit.source: The process of updating the Measurement Recording Card is the same as described in topic .

seg-source.mrk: The process of updating the Measurement Recording Card is the same as described in topic .

trans-unit.source: Populate the Measurement Date, Measurement Page No. and Measurement Location fields, being sure to update the lines as well.

seg-source.mrk: Populate the Measurement Date, Measurement Page No.
and Measurement Location fields, being sure to update the lines as well.

trans-unit.source: : Measurement fields updated in header and lines

seg-source.mrk: : Measurement fields updated in header and lines

trans-unit.source: In the Lines FastTab, enter the measured quantities in the Quantity field. If any new measurements were taken on registered quantities, the Cum. Quantity field will show the cumulative total. For example, three lines have registered quantities (4, 4, and 7, respectively). New totals are entered for all three lines (5, 4, and 6, respectively) and the Cum. Quantity field shows the cumulative total of the new Quantity and Cum. Registered Quantity (9, 8, and 13, respectively).

seg-source.mrk: In the Lines FastTab, enter the measured quantities in the Quantity field.
If any new measurements were taken on registered quantities, the <span class="Bold">Cum.
Quantity field will show the cumulative total.
For example, three lines have registered quantities (4, 4, and 7, respectively).
New totals are entered for all three lines (5, 4, and 6, respectively) and the <span class="Bold">Cum.
Quantity field shows the cumulative total of the new Quantity and Cum.
Registered Quantity (9, 8, and 13, respectively).

trans-unit.source: : New measurements added for registered positions and new positions

seg-source.mrk: : New measurements added for registered positions and new positions

trans-unit.source: Click Register and then click Yes to register the document. The Measurement Recording Card closes.

seg-source.mrk: Click Register and then click Yes to register the document.
The Measurement Recording Card closes.

trans-unit.source: Create Second Invoice

seg-source.mrk: Create Second Invoice

trans-unit.source: Now that new measurements have been added to the sales order, the next invoice can be created using the same process described previously.

seg-source.mrk: Now that new measurements have been added to the sales order, the next invoice can be created using the same process described previously.

trans-unit.source: : Sales order with new and previously invoiced lines

seg-source.mrk: : Sales order with new and previously invoiced lines

trans-unit.source: Notice that the registered measurement quantities appear in the lines, taking special notice that the measurement quantity (9) for position 3. 1. 50. exceeds the order quantity (8) by 1.

seg-source.mrk: Notice that the registered measurement quantities appear in the lines, taking special notice that the measurement quantity (9) for position 3.
exceeds the order quantity (8) by 1.

trans-unit.source: Take Over Measurements

seg-source.mrk: Take Over Measurements

trans-unit.source: In the Sales Order, click Reopen and then click Actions > Take over Measurements. A message appears asking to update the order quantity from the measurement quantity.

seg-source.mrk: In the Sales Order, click Reopen and then click Actions > Take over Measurements.
A message appears asking to update the order quantity from the measurement quantity.

trans-unit.source: Click Yes to continue the process. A message appears asking to keep or update the order quantity.

seg-source.mrk: Click Yes to continue the process.
A message appears asking to keep or update the order quantity.

trans-unit.source: : Keep or update order quantity message (also highlighting that the Sales Order has been reopened)

seg-source.mrk: : Keep or update order quantity message (also highlighting that the Sales Order has been reopened)

trans-unit.source: With the Keep order quantity option selected, click OK. The Qty. to Ship field is cleared on all lines except those with measurement values, and contains the Measurement Quantity. Position 3. 1. 50. now contains the measurement quantity as the order quantity because the measurement quantity exceeded the order quantity.

seg-source.mrk: With the Keep order quantity option selected, click OK.
The <span class="Bold">Qty.
to Ship field is cleared on all lines except those with measurement values, and contains the Measurement Quantity.
Position 3.
now contains the measurement quantity as the order quantity because the measurement quantity exceeded the order quantity.

trans-unit.source: : Qty. to Ship updated with measurement quantities (less shipped); order quantity changed on position 3. 1. 50.

seg-source.mrk: : Qty.
to Ship updated with measurement quantities (less shipped); order quantity changed on position 3.

trans-unit.source: Also note that the Measurement Summary Code field is now populated in the Construction Invoicing FastTab. Click Navigate > Measurement Summary to view the summary document that will be used for printing.

seg-source.mrk: Also note that the Measurement Summary Code field is now populated in the Construction Invoicing FastTab.
Click Navigate > Measurement Summary to view the summary document that will be used for printing.

trans-unit.source: : Measurement Summary assigned to Sales Order

seg-source.mrk: : Measurement Summary assigned to Sales Order

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Measurement Summary page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Measurement Summary page.

trans-unit.source: Update Sales Order

seg-source.mrk: Update Sales Order

trans-unit.source: Prior to posting the sales order, in the General FastTab, update the Posting Date field.

seg-source.mrk: Prior to posting the sales order, in the General FastTab, update the Posting Date field.

trans-unit.source: In the Construction Invoicing FastTab, update the Period of performance from and Period of performance to fields.

seg-source.mrk: In the Construction Invoicing FastTab, update the Period of performance from and Period of performance to fields.

trans-unit.source: : Posting Date and Period of performance updated in sales order

seg-source.mrk: : Posting Date and Period of performance updated in sales order

trans-unit.source: Post Sales Order and Print Document

seg-source.mrk: Post Sales Order and Print Document

trans-unit.source: Click Home > Post to ship and invoice the sales order. The Qty. to Ship field is updated with all remaining quantities, the Qty. Shipped shows the shipped values, and the Measurement Summary Code field is cleared in the Construction Invoicing FastTab since the measurement has been processed.

seg-source.mrk: Click Home > Post to ship and invoice the sales order.
The <span class="Bold">Qty.
to Ship field is updated with all remaining quantities, the Qty.
Shipped shows the shipped values, and the Measurement Summary Code field is cleared in the Construction Invoicing FastTab since the measurement has been processed.

trans-unit.source: : Sales Order after posting

seg-source.mrk: : Sales Order after posting

trans-unit.source: Click Navigate > Invoices > View to open the Posted Sales Invoice. The Construction Invoicing FastTab displays related construction information.

seg-source.mrk: Click Navigate > Invoices > View to open the Posted Sales Invoice.
The Construction Invoicing FastTab displays related construction information.

trans-unit.source: Click Actions > Print to open the Sales - Invoice dialog (for report 5292686). A new Saved Settings FastTab appears indicating that the last used options and filters have been set.

seg-source.mrk: Click Actions > Print to open the Sales - Invoice dialog (for report 5292686).
A new Saved Settings FastTab appears indicating that the last used options and filters have been set.

trans-unit.source: : Sales - Invoice print dialog with new Saved Settings FastTab

seg-source.mrk: : Sales - Invoice print dialog with new Saved Settings FastTab

trans-unit.source: Click Print to generate a document or Preview to view the document. The Sales Invoice document contains measurement information.

seg-source.mrk: Click Print to generate a document or Preview to view the document.
The Sales Invoice document contains measurement information.

trans-unit.source: : Sales Invoice with Measurements for only the second invoice (not cumulative)

seg-source.mrk: : Sales Invoice with Measurements for only the second invoice (not cumulative)

trans-unit.source: Escape back to the Sales Order.

trans-unit.source: Add New Measurements

seg-source.mrk: Add New Measurements

trans-unit.source: In the Sales Order, click Home > Measurement Document. A message appears asking to insert the complete BoQ in the measurement document.

seg-source.mrk: In the Sales Order, click Home > Measurement Document.
A message appears asking to insert the complete BoQ in the measurement document.

trans-unit.source: Click Yes to insert the complete BoQ. A new Measurement Recording Card opens.

seg-source.mrk: Click Yes to insert the complete BoQ.
A new Measurement Recording Card opens.

trans-unit.source: The process of updating the Measurement Recording Card is the same as described in topic .

seg-source.mrk: The process of updating the Measurement Recording Card is the same as described in topic .

trans-unit.source: Populate the Measurement Date, Measurement Page No. and Measurement Location fields, being sure to update the lines as well.

seg-source.mrk: Populate the Measurement Date, Measurement Page No.
and Measurement Location fields, being sure to update the lines as well.

trans-unit.source: : Measurement fields updated in header and lines

seg-source.mrk: : Measurement fields updated in header and lines

trans-unit.source: In the Lines FastTab, enter the measured quantities in the Quantity field. Since this is the last invoice, all open positions should have registered measurements or new measurements. For example, the first four positions have new quantities, the next three positions have registered quantities, and the last four have new and registered quantities. Notice that a new measurement was not entered for position 3. 1. 70., which means the final measurement quantity is less than the order quantity. This will be handled in the “Take over Measurement” process in the Sales Order.

seg-source.mrk: In the Lines FastTab, enter the measured quantities in the Quantity field.
Since this is the last invoice, all open positions should have registered measurements or new measurements.
For example, the first four positions have new quantities, the next three positions have registered quantities, and the last four have new and registered quantities.
Notice that a new measurement was not entered for position 3.
1. 70., which means the final measurement quantity is less than the order quantity.
This will be handled in the “Take over Measurement” process in the Sales Order.

trans-unit.source: : New measurements added for registered positions and new positions

seg-source.mrk: : New measurements added for registered positions and new positions

trans-unit.source: Click Register and then click Yes to register the document. The Measurement Recording Card closes.

seg-source.mrk: Click Register and then click Yes to register the document.
The Measurement Recording Card closes.

trans-unit.source: Create Final Invoice

seg-source.mrk: Create Final Invoice

trans-unit.source: Now that all measurements have been added to the sales order, the final invoice can be created using the same process described previously.

seg-source.mrk: Now that all measurements have been added to the sales order, the final invoice can be created using the same process described previously.

trans-unit.source: : Final sales order with new and previously invoiced lines

seg-source.mrk: : Final sales order with new and previously invoiced lines

trans-unit.source: Notice that the registered measurement quantities appear in the lines, taking special notice that the measurement quantity (13) for position 3. 1. 70. is less than the order quantity (14) by 1.

seg-source.mrk: Notice that the registered measurement quantities appear in the lines, taking special notice that the measurement quantity (13) for position 3.
is less than the order quantity (14) by 1.

trans-unit.source: Take Over Measurements

seg-source.mrk: Take Over Measurements

trans-unit.source: In the Sales Order, click Reopen and then click Actions > Take over Measurements. A message appears asking to update the order quantity from the measurement quantity.

seg-source.mrk: In the Sales Order, click Reopen and then click Actions > Take over Measurements.
A message appears asking to update the order quantity from the measurement quantity.

trans-unit.source: Click Yes to continue the process. A message appears asking to keep or update the order quantity.

seg-source.mrk: Click Yes to continue the process.
A message appears asking to keep or update the order quantity.

trans-unit.source: : Keep or update order quantity message (also highlighting that the Sales Order has been reopened)

seg-source.mrk: : Keep or update order quantity message (also highlighting that the Sales Order has been reopened)

trans-unit.source: Select the Update order quantity option and then click OK. The Qty. to Ship field is cleared on all lines except those with measurement values and contains the Measurement Quantity except for position 3. 1. 70., which is empty because the order quantity was changed to match the completely shipped measurement quantity.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Update order quantity option and then click OK.
The <span class="Bold">Qty.
to Ship field is cleared on all lines except those with measurement values and contains the Measurement Quantity except for position 3.
1. 70., which is empty because the order quantity was changed to match the completely shipped measurement quantity.

trans-unit.source: : Qty. to Ship updated with measurement quantities (less shipped)

seg-source.mrk: : Qty.
to Ship updated with measurement quantities (less shipped)

trans-unit.source: The Measurement Summary Code field is now populated in the Construction Invoicing FastTab. Click Navigate > Measurement Summary to view the summary document that will be used for printing.

seg-source.mrk: The Measurement Summary Code field is now populated in the Construction Invoicing FastTab.
Click Navigate > Measurement Summary to view the summary document that will be used for printing.

trans-unit.source: In the Construction Invoicing FastTab, update the Period of performance from and Period of performance to fields.

trans-unit.source: Click Home > Post to ship and invoice the sales order. After posting, click Yes to open the Posted Sales Invoice. The Construction Invoicing FastTab displays related construction information.

After posting, click Yes to open the Posted Sales Invoice.
The Construction Invoicing FastTab displays related construction information.
